welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mississauga, where the charm of a vibrant, diverse city meets the beauty of its natural surroundings. Known for its lively cultural scene, delicious local cuisine, and stunning lakefront, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Mississauga has to offer.

restaurants.name: Panera Bread
restaurants.description: Panera Bread is a bakery located in Mississauga.
restaurants.address: 55 Square One Drive, Unit #1 (at City Centre Dr), Mississauga ON L5B 0E2

restaurants.name: La Carnita
restaurants.description: La Carnita is a mexican restaurant located in Mississauga.
restaurants.address: 100 City Centre Drive, Mississauga ON L5B 2C9

restaurants.name: Chipotle Mexican Grill
restaurants.description: Chipotle Mexican Grill is a mexican restaurant located in Mississauga.
restaurants.address: 100 City Centre Dr, Suite 3 (Square One Food Court), Mississauga ON L5B 2C9

restaurants.name: The Food District
restaurants.description: The Food District is a food court located in Mississauga.
restaurants.address: 100 City Centre Dr, Mississauga ON L5B 2C9

restaurants.name: Scaddabush Italian Kitchen & Bar Square One
restaurants.description: Scaddabush Italian Kitchen & Bar Square One is a italian restaurant located in Mississauga.
restaurants.address: 209 Rathburn Road West (at Duke of York Blvd.), Mississauga ON L5B 4C1

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toronto City Centre Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Billy Bishop VIP Lounge
terminals.description: For passengers looking for a more luxurious experience, the VIP lounge at Toronto City Centre Airport offers premium amenities and services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.
